items.preText: 1.50pm A side that didn't last five days combined across two Tests suddenly transformed their game like they'd used a magic wand. Welcome back to the chase. Akshay's taking a breather. I'm back rejuvenated to take you through to drinks. We're still 10 minutes away from a resumption.
items.text: back of a length, jumps and tucks into the on side
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: nice bowling. Length ball, seams away off the deck and rips past the outside edge of Tamim half-heartedly playing forward
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length on off, takes a solid stride forward and blocks
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length on off, defended back
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: nice mix-up. Follows up the length deliveries with a short one viciously climbing and forcing Tamim to arch back
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length, skips down leg as Tamim misses the glance
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

items.text: short of a length on off, blocked into the off side
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Holder Readers in India can watch this match LIVE here.
items.text: straightens from a back of a length and the extra bounce catches him on the stomach area
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: sharp swing away from a fifth or sixth-stump line, left alone
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: edged and taken. Holder's given Bangladesh a miserable time all tour. And this is a top delivery. Pitched up and inviting the batsman forward, and as Anamul pushes forward, it jags away and shaves the outside of the bat to settle into the hands of second slip
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, OUT

dismissal.text: Anamul Haque c Nurse b Holder 0 (3b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

items.text: full, angled across, pushed down the ground gently
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full, angled across off, driven off the front foot past extra cover
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length ball that straightens from outside off, defended
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of a length, tucked off the hips around the corner
items.shortText: Russell to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: Davo from GUYAN: "Here's some local tip..... don't ever try predicting the weather in Guyana, we have a saying here..if you want rain, bring cricket...however, it rained heavily 3 days ago but since then we've had bright sunshine...trust me we won't get any rain today, the clouds usually build up here but the rain blows towards the western area.. i am GUYANESE.....also, i am here in the Green Stand applauding as the players walk out.."
items.text: short, angled across, arches out of the way
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short ball, tucks him up by banging it in around middle, and forces him to arch away
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of good length, leg-stump line, tucked through square leg
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.preText: A mild drizzle has already begun. Just a drop or two on the camera lens.
items.text: length ball, gets opened up slightly as he blocks
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length on the fourth-stump line, left alone
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: almost walks into the shot as he feels for one that cuts in from outside off and nearly nicks it through
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Drizzle has picked up. We should be away any moment now.
items.text: full, strides across to meet the pitch and pushes through the covers
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: chases a wide length ball and miscues it off the toe-end to mid-off
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length outside off, crisply carves it away to backward point who flings himself to his left to cut it off
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full, left alone outside off
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: advances down the ground but Holder takes it away from him and he's forced to let it go
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run
